title: Sony Xperia Ace 3 leak shows off square design and iPhone SE 2022 size
content:
Sony phones usually aren’t too popular outside of the company’s home country of Japan, but Sony still maintains a somewhat-unique hardware design (as unique as a slab of glass and metal can be, anyway) and support for the 3.5mm headphone jack. Now an upcoming Xperia phone has been leaked, and it… looks like most of

The post Sony Xperia Ace 3 leak shows off square design and iPhone SE 2022 size appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Sony's upcoming Xperia Ace 3 has leaked in a new set of render images, showing off a mid-range design with the size of an iPhone SE 2022.
